titles.title: It Is Glory Just To Walk With Him

authors.author: Avis Marguerite Burgeson Christiansen Haldor Lille

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
It is glory, just to walk with Him.
It is glory, just to walk with Him.

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
He will guide my steps aright,
Thro' the vale and o'er the height.
It is glory, just to walk with Him.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
It is glory, just to walk with Him,
Whose blood has ransomed me.
It is rapture for my soul each day,
It is joy divine to feel,

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
To feel Him near.
Where'er my path may be,
Bless the Lord,
It's glory all the way.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
It is glory when the shadows fall,
To know that He is near.
Oh what joy to simply trust and pray,

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
It is glory to abide in Him.
When skies above are clear,
Yes, with Him it's glory all the way.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
'Twill be glory when I walk,
With Him on heaven's golden shore.
Never from His side again to stray,

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
'Twill be glory, wondrous glory,
With the Savior evermore,
Everlasting glory all the way.
